two round 1 start in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet on both sides of the chain 12 start in white yarn the hands are made in round 2 12 single_crochet 12 two parts then joined together round 3 2sc increase 4x 16 thumb round 4-6 16 single_crochet 16 round 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 4 round 7 you are going to join this part with round 2 single_crochet increase 2x 6 the thumb continue
